titles.title: A resolution to direct the Senate Legal Counsel to represent the President of the Senate and the President pro tempore in the case of McWherter v. Bush, et al.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 5/13/1987--Introduced. Directs the Senate Legal Counsel to represent the President of the Senate and the President pro tempore of the Senate in the case of McWherter v. Bush, et al.
